abstract: The French drug maker seeks to bolster its biotechnology offerings by buying Genzyme.
snippet: The French drug maker seeks to bolster its biotechnology offerings by buying Genzyme.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis has made an informal takeover approach to Genzyme, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday, as the French drug maker seeks to bolster its biotechnology offerings.

headline.main: Sanofi Said to Have Offered to Make a Bid for Genzyme
headline.print_headline: Sanofi Said to Have Offered To Make a Bid for Genzyme

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
